title: Financial Services - Does Big Data mean Big Risk?
abstract: docGenix enhances the counterparty credit risk capability of participants in the global financial markets by providing services and products designed to facilitate the proactive management and monitoring of mission-critical legal information contained in voluminous portfolios of legal trading agreements such as those published by ISDA. docGenix also provides its clients with improved operational capability via the provision of web service data feeds designed to interface with downstream applications such as collateral and risk management systems. The docGenix services and products are enabled by an XML data model that represents legal agreements as machinereadable algorithms. For further information see www.docgenix.com

surveys.comments: Interesting to see the advanced queries and the ingest process.
